info.author: Jasper Danielson
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3)
info.description:
Scale Audio is a cross-platform collection of tools for working with audio in the Python programming language. It is designed to be versatile and powerful, as well as intuitive and easy to use.

With Scale, you can: play, record, convert, synthesize, and filter audio; access a variety of information and statistics; and apply a number of other enhancements and effects.

Scale Audio is built on the powerful command-line utility SoX, which has over 1,000,000 downloads and 20 years of excellence. Both SoX and Scale are released under the GNU General Public License, making Scale Audio free and open source software for any application.
info.name: scale
info.summary: A cross-platform audio manipulation toolkit for Python.
info.html_description:
Scale Audio is a cross-platform collection of tools for working with audio in the Python programming language. It is designed to be versatile and powerful, as well as intuitive and easy to use.

With Scale, you can: play, record, convert, synthesize, and filter audio; access a variety of information and statistics; and apply a number of other enhancements and effects.

Scale Audio is built on the powerful command-line utility SoX, which has over 1,000,000 downloads and 20 years of excellence. Both SoX and Scale are released under the GNU General Public License, making Scale Audio free and open source software for any application.
